text: Camille Saviola (July 16, 1950 â€“ October 28, 2021) was an American actress and singer. She played Olga in The Purple Rose of Cairo. She also appeared as Bajoran religious leader, Kai Opaka, in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. Saviola died on October 28, 2021 in Los Angeles, California at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from the Bronx Category:Singers from New York City
